text: Sediminibacillus massiliensis is a Gram-positive, moderately halophilic, aerobic, rod-shaped and motile bacterium from the genus of Sediminibacillus which has been isolated from human feaces from Dielmo in Senegal. ==References== Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Sediminibacillus massiliensis
